articles.description: Beijing, July 24 China on Sunday launched Wentian, the first lab module of its space station.The new module will function both as a backup of the core module and as a powerful scientific experiment platform, Xinhua reported.Wentian, which literally means 'que…
articles.content:
Beijing, July 24 China on Sunday launched Wentian, the first lab module of its space station.
The new module will function both as a backup of the core module and as a powerful scientific experiment… [+1331 chars]
